title: Citi Second Quarter 2011 Fixed Income Investor Review
summary: New York – John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer, and Eric Aboaf, Treasurer, will conduct the second quarter 2011 Fixed Income Investor Review at 10 a.m. (EDT) on Thursday, July 21, 2011. The review will be available live via webcast and teleconference.
tag-1: Citi Second Quarter 2011 Fixed Income Investor Review
tag-2: New York – John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer, and Eric Aboaf, Treasurer, will conduct the second quarter 2011 Fixed Income Investor Review at 10 a.m. (EDT) on Thursday, July 21, 2011. The review will be available live via webcast and teleconference.
tag-3: The webcast and presentation materials will be available at http://www.citigroup.com/citi/fin. A replay of the webcast will be available at http://www.citigroup.com/citi/fin/pres.htm.
tag-4: To dial-in to the live teleconference, please dial:
tag-5: U.S. & Canada: (800) 309-5794 International Callers: (706) 902-3256 Conference code: 74980794
tag-6: Telephone lines will open at 9:45 a.m. (EDT).
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
